sense.def:
One's point of view
je človekovo mnenje o nečem ali odnos do nečesa.

seg.quote: We understand your point of view.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj presojamo
from a particular point of view
, na podlagi enega vidika okoliščin ocenimo celoten položaj.

seg.quote: From the commercial point of view, they have little to lose.
